spec_data.Name: transmission-remote-cli
spec_data.Description:
Simple command line interface using ncurses for the Transmission BitTorrent
client. It is an alternative to Transmission cli and can be used to control
local and remote instances of the Transmission daemon.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 11:18:01 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A console interface for the Transmission BitTorrent client
